name: Round
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Round except Unown, Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Burmy, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Deals damage, which doubles to 120 if used consecutively by an ally. If used by an ally, it will be directly after the first user, regardless of Speed.
viability: Round can yield some interesting results. The only problem is that the first hit will be kind of weak, but that second will deal a lot damage. It's not a bad move in Doubles/Triples, but isn't recommended over soemthing like Hyper Voice.
